data.comment: The match is underway at Philips Stadion.
Goal! The home team take a 1-0 lead through Donyell Malen.
In the minute 5, Eran Zahavi with an assist there.
Mats Seuntjens (Sittard) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 46, Jeroen Manschot has blown to start the second-half.
Eindhoven make their first substitution with Chukwunonso Madueke replacing Eran Zahavi.
Jorrit Hendrix is replacing Mauro Junior for the home team.
In the minute 71, Kevin Hofland (Sittard) is making a first substitution, with Emil Hansson replacing Lisandro Semedo.
The away team have replaced Jorrit Smeets with Bassala Sambou. This is the second substitution made today by Kevin Hofland.
Eindhoven take a comfortable 2-0 lead thanks to Chukwunonso Madueke.
In the minute 85, That's a fine assist from Donyell Malen.
Djibril Dianessy is replacing George Cox for Sittard at Philips Stadion.
Branislav Ninaj is on a sub for Lazaros Rota for Sittard.
The match has come to a close in Eindhoven. The final score is 2-0.
The home team replace Donyell Malen with Michal Sadilek.
Roger Schmidt is making the team's fourth substitution at Philips Stadion with Joel Piroe replacing Ryan Thomas.
